channel.title: Notice board | Unimi
channel.description: General notice board of the University of Milan "La Statale"

item.title: Closed dates
item.description: The University will be closing for the winter holidays from 24 to 29 December 2024, on 1 January and from 4 to 6 January 2025. %0A

item.title: Special English Test session dedicated to soon-to-be graduates in the Winter Session
item.description: The SLAM Centre is running a special English test session dedicated to soon-to-be graduates in the autumn session. The test is being held in person at the SLAM Centre, 11, Santa Sofia street ‚Äì Milan - on the following day:%0A‚Ä¢ 24th January 2024 at 10.00 a.m.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: Call for the B1 Preliminary (PET) exam on 18 + 19 February 2025
item.description: The call is open to register for the digital Cambridge English B1 Preliminary (PET) exam scheduled on 18 + 19 February 2025.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Call for the B2 First (FCE) exam on 18 + 19 February 2025 - SOLD OUT
item.description: The call is open to register for the digital Cambridge English B2 First (FCE) exam scheduled on 18 + 19 February 2025.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Se.Fa offices closure and student reception during Christmas holidays
item.description: Se.Fa offices will be closed on December 23, 2024 and January 2, 2025. Student reception for Law and Sciences of Legal Services degree programmes will only be available remotely on 30 and 31 December 2024, either via MS Teams (please click on the following link) or via phone call on 02-50312473.%0A

item.title: Se.Fa offices closure during Christmas holidays
item.description: The Se.Fa offices of the Faculty of Political, Economic and Social Sciences will be closed on 30 and 31 December 2024.%0A

item.title: Closure of Humanities Se.Fa Offices during Christmas holidays
item.description: Se.Fa Offices at the Faculty of Humanities will be closed on 30 and 31 December 2024.%0A

item.title: Faculty Championship 2025
item.description: To encourage students to participate in the competitions, classes will be suspended on the following dates: %0A‚Ä¢ Tuesday, 15 April 2025 ONLY for students of the LITA campus in Segrate (from 11 am onwards)%0A%0A‚Ä¢ Wednesday, 21 May 2025 for all students of the Faculty of Medicine (all classes scheduled for the day). %0A%0A
